refnamediv.refpurpose: set self-healing delay for &medic; in milliseconds

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: g_medicSelfHealDelay sets the self-healing delay for &medic; in milliseconds. This controls how soon, if at all, a &medic; may benefit from their own medpacks (or medpacks dropped by other teammates). A value of 0 permits immediate self-healing. A value of -1 disables self-healing. A positive value delays self-healing by period milliseconds.
